name: Fall 2025 Tech Accessories Launch
campaign_message: Introducing our new line of premium tech accessories for the modern professional

products.name: Wireless Charging Pad
products.description: Fast wireless charging pad compatible with all Qi-enabled devices. Sleek aluminum design with LED indicator.

products.name: Premium Laptop Sleeve
products.description: Handcrafted leather laptop sleeve with soft interior lining. Fits 13-15 inch laptops perfectly.

products.name: Noise-Canceling Earbuds
products.description: Advanced noise-canceling technology with 24-hour battery life. Crystal-clear sound quality for calls and music.

products.name: Ergonomic Mouse Pad
products.description: Memory foam wrist support with smooth tracking surface. Reduces wrist strain during extended use.
